original_title: Equal Rights for Unborn Drag Queens
overview: Equal Rights for Unborn Drag Queens is a satirical short film in which Brenda and Glennda critique anti-abortion politics, homophobia, and religious fanaticism in the media. Interspersed between clips of right-wing news broadcasts is footage of Brenda having her nipple pierced, in an homage to Sandy Daley's Robert Having His Nipple Pierced (1971).
title: Equal Rights for Unborn Drag Queens
